Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

“Mid-tavern, this masked being announces, ‘I see light. I am enlightened. I bring light to you.’ Apparently, some folk at the bar didn’t want to be enlightened. They got rough. Off comes her gloves. Rather than the typical skin, this Light Bringer’s got glowing coals for hands. She jumps up and strikes her foe. There’s a fiery blast. I dove behind the bar, crawling for the kitchen door. I don’t think the ruffian infidels escaped the wreckage. That poor tavern owner; he’s now the proud owner of an ash heap.”— Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-38347X: Tales from Fallen Worlds”

“酒馆中，这个戴着面具的生物宣布，‘我看到了光明，我受到了启迪，我会将光明带给你们。’显然，酒馆中的某些人不想受到启迪。他们动起手来，他们扒下了她的手套。这位光明使者的皮肤与众不同，她的手上满是发着光的炭渣。她跳了起来，攻击了对她动粗的人。发生了极为猛烈的爆炸。我躲在吧台后面，爬向厨房的大门。我不认为那群粗鲁的异教徒能够活着离开。可怜的酒馆老板，只能看着自己的酒馆被烧成灰烬。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-38347X：失落世界的传说”

“Consider each Path of Light.[br/]Heed the Star Guide’s Communing Call.[br/]Trace the Structure of Orderly Stars.[br/]Ponder Purple Purposeful Night.[br/]Discipline your Questioning Mind.[br/]Abandon Evolution’s own Appetite.[br/]Believe the Faithful’s Perpetual Fight.[br/]Transcend your Natural fleshy Lusts.[br/][br/]Be seen by the All-Searching Eye.[br/]Become a Being of Light.”— Star Guide Shin’Shia Shiq “RV-6600R: Celestian Vespers”
“仔细思考每一条光明之路。[br/]遵从星辰向导的指引。[br/]追踪秩序星辰的构造。[br/]沉思紫色的目的之夜。[br/]控制你的疑问思绪。[br/]放弃进化本身的欲望。[br/]坚信忠诚者的永恒之战。[br/]超脱你天然肉体的欲望。[br/][br/]全索之眼注视着你。[br/]成为光明之身。”- 星辰向导辛西亚·仕奇科“RV-6600R：星神晚祷”

“I’ll admit, Celestians are most impressive in their disciplined pursuit of higher power. I traveled with an Ascended Teacher of the Celestian order. He reminded me of the bright beings from fervent proselyting religions of the forgotten past. They too led armies and inspired worship or burning. This Teacher had the power to convict the souls of whole armies. Teacher’s radiance healed the faithful and scorched the hateful. Yet, I’ll never forget Teacher’s haunting stillness when I asked him the three words I ask all who claim to have found ultimate purpose.[br/][br/]Are you happy?”— Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-5577X: Forgotten Places”

“我承认，星神修会最令人印象深刻的就是他们在追求更高力量时的自律。我曾与一名星神修会的升华导师同行，他使我想起了被遗忘的过去中那些热情劝人改变信仰的人，他们也率领着军队，激发人们的崇拜或愤怒。这名导师的力量足够给整个军队的人定罪。导师的光辉治疗了信徒，扫除了仇恨。然而我永远也不会忘记，当我向他问出那四个字的问题时，他那突如其来的沉默。我总是会向那些自称已经找到了终极目标的人询问这个问题。[br/][br/]那就是：你快乐吗？”玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-5577X：遗忘之地”
